text: Aho muzaba muri hose urupfu ruzahabasanga, kabone n’ubwo mwaba muri mu nyubako z’imitamenwa. Kandi n’iyo bagezweho n’icyiza, baravuga bati “Iki giturutse kwa Allah”, naho bagerwaho n’ikibi, bakavuga bati “Iki kiguturutseho (wowe Muhamadi).” Vuga uti “Byose bituruka kwa Allah.” Ese kuki abantu batabasha gusobanukirwa ibyo babwirwa
